   16: 
   17: -module(websockets_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   24: %% Suite configuration
   25: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   26: 
   27: -define(REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT, 2).  %% seconds
   28: 
   29: all() ->
   30:     [{group, ws_chat},
   31:      {group, wss_chat}].
   32: 
   33: groups() ->
   34:     [{ws_chat, [sequence], test_cases()},
   35:      {wss_chat, [sequence], test_cases()}
   36:     ].
   37: 
   38: test_cases() ->
   39:     [chat_msg,
   40:      escape_chat_msg,
   41:      escape_attrs].
   42: 
   43: suite() ->
   44:     escalus:suite().
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: %% Init & teardown
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: 
   50: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   51:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   52: 
   53: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   54:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   55: 
   56: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config1 = escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, geralt, geralt_s, oldie])),
   58:     case GroupName of
   59:         wss_chat ->
   60:             [{user, geralt_s} | Config1];
   61:         _ ->
   62:             [{user, geralt} | Config1]
   63:     end.
   64: 
   65: 
   66: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   67:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, geralt, geralt_s, oldie])).
   68: 
   69: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   70:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   71: 
   72: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   73:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   74: 
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: %% Message tests
   77: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   78: 
   79: chat_msg(Config) ->
   80:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {?config(user, Config), 1}, {oldie, 1}], fun(Alice, Geralt, Oldie) ->
   81: 
   82:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Geralt, <<"Hi!">>)),
   83:         FromAlice = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Geralt),
   84:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi!">>], FromAlice),
   85:         escalus:assert(has_ns, [<<"jabber:client">>], FromAlice),
   86: 
   87:         escalus_client:send(Geralt, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hello!">>)),
   88:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hello!">>], escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
   89: 
   90:         escalus_client:send(Geralt, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Oldie, <<"Hey!">>)),
   91:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hey!">>, escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Oldie))
   92: 
   93:         end).
   94: 
   95: escape_chat_msg(Config) ->
   96:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {?config(user, Config), 1}, {oldie, 1}], fun(Alice, Geralt, Oldie) ->
   97:         special_chars_helper:check_cdata_from_to(Alice, Geralt, <<"Hi! & < >">>),
   98:         special_chars_helper:check_cdata_from_to(Geralt, Alice, <<"Hello! & < >">>),
   99:         special_chars_helper:check_cdata_from_to(Geralt, Oldie, <<"Hey! & < >">>)
  100: 
  101:     end).
  102: 
  103: escape_attrs(Config) ->
  104:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {?config(user, Config), 1}, {oldie, 1}], fun(Alice, Geralt, Oldie) ->
  105:         special_chars_helper:check_attr_from_to(Alice, Geralt),
  106:         special_chars_helper:check_attr_from_to(Geralt, Alice),
  107:         special_chars_helper:check_attr_from_to(Geralt, Oldie)
  108: 
  109:     end).
  110: 
  111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: %% Helpers
  113: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  114:
